★★★★★ A Super-dynamic, brilliant, radiant gems clix game "Ultimate Gem" is coming!
★★★★★ Has gorgeous screen, dynamic sound, and sweet music.
★★★★★ Has 2 kinds of super-fun game modes, called: Time killer.

________________________________

How to Play:

- Just tap three or more gems of the same color.
- No time limit, but each level has target score to proceed to next level.

________________________________

Tips:

- The more gems you clean, the more score you will get.

________________________________

Rule:

3 Blocks = 45 points
4 Blocks = 80 points
5 Blocks = 125 points
6 Blocks = 180 points
...
10 Blocks = 500 points
...
20 Blocks = 2000 points

________________________________

Features:

- Autosave when terminated or get a call
- Supports iPhone iOS4
- All available for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad
